message.content:
cs.MA, cs.AI, cs.SI, cs.HC, cs.GR 

The paper discusses the use of agent-based modelling and particle filters to simulate crowds in real-time, which falls under the category of multi-agent systems (cs.MA). The paper also discusses the use of artificial intelligence techniques such as particle filters, which suggests that it could also be classified under cs.AI. The focus on modelling human behaviour and interactions also suggests that it could be classified under cs.SI (social and information networks). The paper also has implications for human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and graphics (cs.GR) as it discusses the simulation of complex environments.
